easteregg.textToDisplayUnderMinVersion: We will be ending support for this app (grey icon) on 12/27. Our revamped mobile trading app is now available free on iTunes. But first, you need to upgrade your iOS software to 4.0 or higher.
easteregg.textToDisplayOverMinVersion: We will be ending support for this app (grey icon) on 12/27. Discover our redesigned mobile trading app with lots of new, easy-to-use features.
